Ingredients.1: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle dry white wine, such as Pinot Grigio

Ingredients.8: 2 cups club soda, or as needed (Optional)

Ingredients.9: 1  fresh peach, sliced, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.10: 1 cup chopped fresh pineapple, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Pour white wine, peach nectar, triple sec, orange juice, pineapple juice, and peach schnapps into a 2-quart pitcher and stir to mix. Chill for 3 to 4 hours, if possible.

Directions.2: Pour over ice in tall glasses and top with club soda. Garnish with fresh peach slices and pineapple.
